name: KARTHIK BIBIREDDY
headline: Senior Software Engineer | Aspiring Quantitative Developer
professionalSummary: Experienced software engineer with 7+ years designing distributed systems, scalable APIs, and data pipelines at Amazon and multiple startups. Strong foundation in computer science, statistics, and mathematics. Built a personal technical analysis platform for trading strategy research. Eager to apply my engineering expertise and passion for finance in a quantitative developer or data-focused finance role.

workExperience.title: Software Development Engineer
description: Led development of Alexa personalization features, including voice-based user settings on shared devices.
Built messaging middleware for in-car Alexa integration, improving real-time responsiveness and scalability.
Designed and implemented APIs serving pricing references for global product detail and search pages (30B+ daily views).
Developed large-scale ETL pipelines using Scala and Spark to process billions of pricing records daily.
Created internal tooling to automate configuration/testing workflows, increasing engineering efficiency by 25%.
Led regional historic pricing feature for Amazon Fresh, improving price transparency and customer trust.
Implemented runtime safeguards against malicious Lister pricing strategies, reducing compute load by 10%.
Participated in on-call rotations, sprint planning, and cross-team collaboration within agile frameworks.
Mentored junior engineers and conducted regular knowledge-sharing sessions.

workExperience.title: Software Engineer
description: Integrated computer vision models into secure and performant front-end web and desktop apps.
Designed microservices and REST APIs using AWS Lambda, API Gateway, CloudFormation, and DynamoDB.
Managed model inference infrastructure on EC2, ensuring performance optimization and secure deployment.
Enhanced system modularity and fault tolerance across distributed ML services.
Delivered reliable, customer-facing applications across various industries.

workExperience.title: Software Engineer
description: Led end-to-end development of aerospace software solutions, from requirements to deployment.
Designed geolocation 3D mapping and ASDB-based aircraft tracking for ground control stations.
Built real-time Primary Flight Display (PFD) systems enabling in-flight monitoring and decision-making.
Developed internal APIs and tools to manage and scale the open-source avionics project, Airliner.
Transformed ground station UI into a modular multi-window system, enhancing multi-user workflows.
Ensured high-quality releases via code reviews, on-site acceptance testing, and outdoor flight trials.

workExperience.title: Software Developer Intern
description: Developed customer-facing web apps and machine learning services for energy and finance sectors.
Collaborated with content managers and UI designers to resolve cross-browser and UX issues.
Prototyped NLP tools for data extraction and aggregation pipelines, improving automation efficiency.
Deployed ML-backed APIs to AWS infrastructure and participated in QA and integration testing cycles.

projects.title: Technical Analysis Platform for Financial Markets (TAPFM)
description: Designed and developed a personal project for backtesting and analyzing trading strategies using real-world financial data.
Implemented event-driven data fetching with AWS Lambda and S3, storing and processing historical market data.
Built ETL jobs for sentiment scoring, indicator computation, and strategy evaluation.
Created a dashboard for midterm decision support, along with a strategy development and backtesting toolkit.
